TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_SWAMP ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() return (filter:CountStopAt( 1 ) > 0)
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local decision = Object():GetMultipleChoiceResult() if decision == 0 then local player = TriggerPlayer() if player ~= nil and CountCardsInHand( player ) > 0 then player:DiscardNCards(1, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CARD_TO_DISCARD") end end
